required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Iontophoresis With Potassium Iodide and Thyroid Function
clinical_study.official_title: Iontophoresis With Potassium Iodide and the Level of Thyroid Hormones in Healthy Subjects

brief_summary.textblock:
The aim of the study: To assess the influence of iontophoresis treatment with 2% potassium iodide on the level of thyroid hormones (TSH, FT3, FT4) The study group: conducting 10 iontophoresis treatments with Potassium iodide; The control group: conducting 10 placebo treatments with iontophoresis with destilled water; Intervention: 10 iontophoresis treatments with 2% potassium iodide in healthy individuals.
Test the level of thyroid hormones before and after the 10 iontophoresis treatments; The study allows to assess the influence of iodine on the function of thuroid gland.

primary_outcome.measure: the level of thyroid gland hormones (TSH, FT3, FT4)
primary_outcome.time_frame: change in the thyroid hormones level from the baseline to 14 days after the last treatment
primary_outcome.description: to test thyroid hormones before and after 10 iontophoresis treatments

intervention.description: 10 iontophoresis treatments with 2% potassium iodide on the area of thyroid gland; electrodes with tin foil (Amperage:2mA, duration: 30min)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- healthy individuals with normal thyroid function
Exclusion Criteria:
- individuals with thyroid disorders,
- taking thyroid medication,
- using drugs, alcohol, cigaretttes

facility.name: Centre for Innovative Research in Medical and Natural Sciences' Medical Faculty of University of Rzeszow

responsible_party.investigator_title: Head of the Laboratory of Physical Factors
